Class StandingOrderController

java.lang.Object
banking.application.controller.Controller
banking.application.controller.StandingOrderController
@SpringBootApplication @RequestMapping("/standing") public class StandingOrderController extends Controller
Controller handling standing orders

    • AddStandingOrder

      @PostMapping("/{accountType}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> AddStandingOrder(@PathVariable AccountType accountType, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid StandingOrderInput standingOrderInput)
      Add standing order to user's account which type is given in path variable Standing order input is given in request's body
      Parameters:
      standingOrderInput - standing order information
      accountType - account type from which to delete
      Returns:
      list of account's standing orders

    • DeleteStandingOrder

      @DeleteMapping("/{accountType}/{id}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> DeleteStandingOrder(@PathVariable AccountType accountType, @PathVariable String id)
      Delete standing order of user's account which type is given in path variable
      Parameters:
      accountType - account type of which to delete from
      id - id of standing order to delete
      Returns:
      list of account's standing orders

      @PutMapping("/{accountType}/{id}") org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> ModifyStandingOrder(@PathVariable AccountType accountType, @PathVariable String id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid StandingOrderInput standingOrderInput)
      Modify existing standing order
      Parameters:
      accountType - type account from which to modify
      id - id of standing order to modify
      standingOrderInput - modify input
      Returns:

    • fillStandingOrders

      @Scheduled(cron="0 0 10 ? * *") @Transactional @PostConstruct public void fillStandingOrders()
      Checks for unfilled standing orders and executes them
